mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mazzini: and other essays / by Henry Demarest Lloyd
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lloyd, Henry Demarest, 1847-1903
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mazzini: prophet of action.--A day with William Morris.--Emerson's wit and humor.--Sir Harry Vane.--Some Dutch notions.--Free Speech and assemblage.--The scholar in contemporary practical questions.--Is personal development the best social policy?--No mean city.--Index.
The essay entitled "Emerson's wit and humor" was first published in the Forum. cf. Prefactory note.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Social problems
